name: AutoAppVersion
description: A build and release task for automatically incrementing an app's version.
author: ThatBlokeCalledJay

inputs.name: ProjectFile
inputs.label: Project file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project file (.csproj or .vbproj) which will supply the version mask and will be updated with the newly incremented version.

inputs.name: VersionVariable
inputs.label: Version variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable which will hold the current version.

inputs.name: DevOpsPAT
inputs.label: Azure DevOps personal access token (PAT)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your personal access token for Azure DevOps.

inputs.name: SetAssemblyVersion
inputs.label: Set assembly version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Apply the version number to your project file's AssemblyVersion element (if present). Output format will be 'N.N.N.0'

inputs.name: SetFileVersion
inputs.label: Set file version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Apply the version number to your project file's FileVersion element (if present). Output format will be 'N.N.N.0'

inputs.name: EnvVarName
inputs.label: Environment variable name [optional]
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify an environment variable to be set with the new version number. The variable and it's value will be available to all proceeding tasks.

inputs.name: VersionMaskOverride
inputs.label: Version mask override [optional]
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a mask to merge with your project file's existing version. [Click here for more help](https://github.com/ThatBlokeCalledJay/auto-app-version/wiki/Unable-to-Set-Version-Mask-in-Project-File)

inputs.name: StopOnNoMask
inputs.label: Stop On No Mask
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stop the build if your project file's version isn't masked (e.g none of the values have been replaced with a $ symbol).

inputs.name: StopOnDowngrade
inputs.label: Stop On Downgrade
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stop the build if a version downgrade is detected.

inputs.name: StopOnInvalidEVarName
inputs.label: Stop On Invalid Environment Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Stop the build if an environment variable name has been specified, but it is invalid. Validation: Must be less than 256 characters and contain no whitespace.
